DOC.brief_summary: This database has for objective to include the medical data of patients which underwent a vaginal Cesarean Section in our establishment. This collection will allow to determine the risk factors of the maternal morbi-mortality and to estimate the long-term results
DOC.brief_title: Medium and Long-term Complications of the Patients Having Had a Vaginal Caesarian in Hospital Ren√© Dubos
DOC.detailed_description: It is about an operating technique little known which is used as an alternative of the abdominal Cesarean Section for very premature pregnancies and the main indication is the maternal rescue. It has several advantages: simplicity of the technique, the dissection of tissues is limited, low risk of bleeding and no abdominal scar. The purpose is to determine the risk factors of the maternal morbi-mortality and to estimate the long-term results
DOC.criteria: patients operated to vaginal Cesarean in Hospital Rene DUBOS patients followed in a maternity which do not participate to the study
